naslov: Drvenik Mali, kuća na imanju 870 m2, blizu mora (prodaja)
opis: Kućica u cvijeću Lijepa prizemnica tlocrtne površine 150 m2, na imanju od 870 m2 U kući se nalazi kuhinja s dnevnim boravkom, 3 sobe i kupaonica. Dvije velike, bračne sobe i jedna manja sa dva ležaja. Ispred kuće se nalazi natkrivena terasa, na kojoj se nalazi stol i stolice na kojima se može jesti, uživati, čitati i odmarati u prirodi. Sjeverozapadno od kuće je kućica u kojoj dominira kamin. Kamin je velik i ima električni ražanj. U sastavu te kućice se nalazi i jedna mala prostorija, koja služi kao još jedna dodatna soba. Uz kuću se nalaze još dva pomoćna objekta ostava i vodosprema. Na Drveniku Malom nema vode, već vodu trajektom dostavlja vodonosac. Iz vodospreme voda se pumpa u slavinu. Okolo kuće nalaze se autohtone mediteranske biljke: maslina, smokva, žižula, nešpula ... Čempres, trešnja, mnoštvo cvijeća i povrća. Cijelo imanje ograđeno je kamenim zidom unutar kojeg se nalaze 3 ulaza (vrata). Od mora je udaljeno 100 m. Informacije o nekretnini kao i razgled iste moguć je isključivo uz potpis Ugovora o posredovanju u svrhu zaštite imovine vlasnika nekretnine od posjeta neregistriranih osoba, a u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Za sve informacije zvati na 091 937 3688 Ivana ili na email adresu i.fadic@remax.hr ********************************************** A house in flowers A nice one-story house with a floor plan of 150 m2, on a property of 870 m2 The house has a kitchen with a living room, 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. Two large double rooms and one smaller one with two beds. In front of the house there is a covered terrace, where there is a table and chairs where you can eat, enjoy, read and rest in nature. Northwest of the house is a small house dominated by a fireplace. The fireplace is large and has an electric spit. In the composition of that house there is also one small room, which serves as another additional room. Next to the house there are two other auxiliary buildings, a storage room and a water tank. There is no water on Drvenik Mali, but water is delivered by ferry by a water carrier. Water is pumped from the reservoir to the faucet. Around the house, there are autochthonous Mediterranean plants: olive, fig, jujube, nespula... Cypress, cherry lots of flowers and vegetables. The entire property is surrounded by a stone wall, inside which there are 3 entrances (doors). It is 100 m from the sea. Information about the property as well as a viewing of it is possible only with the signature of the Agreement on mediation for the purpose of protecting the property of the owner of the property from visits by unregistered persons, and in accordance with the Law on Data Protection and the Law on Mediation in Real Estate Transactions. For all information, call Ivana on 091 937 3688 or email i.fadic@remax.hr
